# snowflake_current_role (Data Source)


## Example Usage

```terraform
data "snowflake_current_role" "this" {}

resource "aws_ssm_parameter" "snowflake_account_role" {
  name  = "/snowflake/account_role"
  type  = "String"
  value = data.snowflake_current_account.this.name
}
```
